pci_projects_project_edit_default_projec: Default project for every login to the Public Cloud Control Panel

pci_projects_project_edit_remove_descrip:
Deleting your project will erase all the resources stored on it, including data, infrastructure, and services.
Please ensure you have retrieved your crucial data before starting this operation; it cannot be undone.
pci_projects_project_edit_error_forbidde: You do not have enough permissions to view your HDS certification data. Please contact the service owner.
pci_projects_project_edit_discovery_disa: You can only edit in an active project.
